_notes.input_file: Absolute or relative path to the source EPUB file.
_notes.base_output_file: Optional explicit output path; leave blank to auto-create under output/ebook.
_notes.input_language: Source language label used for metadata.
_notes.target_languages: List of target languages to generate outputs for.
_notes.sentences_per_output_file: Number of processed sentences per output batch.
_notes.start_sentence: Sentence number to start processing from (1-indexed).
_notes.end_sentence: Sentence number to stop at (null to process all sentences).
_notes.max_words: Maximum words per sentence chunk before splitting.
_notes.percentile: Percentile used when suggesting max_words interactively.
_notes.split_on_comma_semicolon: Toggle to split long sentences on commas/semicolons.
_notes.generate_audio: Set to true to create MP3 narration.
_notes.generate_video: Set to true to create video slides.
_notes.audio_mode: Audio formatting mode (see interactive menu descriptions).
_notes.include_transliteration: Include transliteration for non-Latin target languages.
_notes.word_highlighting: Enable per-word highlighting in generated videos.
_notes.stitch_full: Combine batch outputs into stitched deliverables.
_notes.book_title: Metadata title applied to generated files.
_notes.book_author: Metadata author applied to generated files.
_notes.book_cover_file: Optional custom cover image path (null to auto-generate).
_notes.selected_voice: Voice identifier (gTTS or macOS voice name).
_notes.macos_reading_speed: Words per minute when using macOS TTS voices.
_notes.sync_ratio: Timing ratio for aligning subtitles in videos.
_notes.output_dir: Directory for generated ebook assets relative to working_dir.
_notes.ollama_model: Model identifier used for translation requests.
